abstracts.cdata!:
The Education Project consists of: (a)
            construction, furniture and equipment for the expansion of
            the Agricultural University at Mymensingh, together with
            overseas fellowships for teaching staff; (b) construction,
            furniture and equipment for the expansion of five technical
            institutes and equipment for an additional eight institutes;
            and (c) equipment and technical assistance to upgrade the
            Technical Teacher Training College, Dacca.
